title: Default Activation Template
body:
# 1Password for Business activation
Dear customer,

thank you for subscribing to 1Password for Business!

To create the admin account ({{ admin_email }}) please click on the following activation link:

[Activate subscription]({{ activation_link }})

title: Default Activation Template
body:
# Sample Template For Setup of Tier 1

This template is used to share details of the **successful** setup configuration of reseller of 1st level.

This template uses **[Markdown](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown)** syntax and allows to use Parameters of the product which have scope 'Tier 1'.

### Formatting

Markdown allows you to control various aspects of the document:

1. Text formatting like **bold** or *italic*
2. Images embedding
3. Lists
4. and more

### Parameters

You can refer to the Parameters using their ID, like in the following example:

* The value of **param_a** is **{{ param_a }}**
* The value of **param_b** is **{{ param_b }}**

You can also embed pictures like the one below:

![logo](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b2/Ringworld_Waiting.jpg/270px-Ringworld_Waiting.jpg)

title: Default Activation Template
body:
# Sample Template For Setup of Tier 2

This template is used to share details of the **successful** setup configuration of reseller of 2nd level.

This template uses **[Markdown](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown)** syntax and allows to use Parameters of the product which have scope 'Tier 2'.

### Formatting

Markdown allows you to control various aspects of the document:

1. Text formatting like **bold** or *italic*
2. Images embedding
3. Lists
4. and more

### Parameters

You can refer to the Parameters using their ID, like in the following example:

* The value of **param_a** is **{{ param_a }}**
* The value of **param_b** is **{{ param_b }}**

You can also embed pictures like the one below:

![logo](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b2/Ringworld_Waiting.jpg/270px-Ringworld_Waiting.jpg)

title: Additional information is required to process your request
body: Please complete our **[Activation Form]({{ activation_form_url }})** to resume processing of your request
